metaDescriptionProject.metaDescriptionProject: The 'Role Model' music video for French band Phoenix features archival 1980's footage of fashion photographer Helmut Newton. Directed by Chris Hopkins/Lost Art.

metaKeywordsProject.metaKeywordsProject: Lost Art, Music Video, Phoenix, Role Model, Ti Amo, Helmut Newton, Chris Hopkins, Forever Pictures, Director, Creative Agency, Australia

content.content:
from the album 'ti amo', lost art directed & produced the music video 'role model' for french band phoenix. it uses visual effects to integrate the band into archival 1980s footage featuring legendary fashion photographer helmut newton. shot in melbourne, 'role model' premiered on made to measure tv.

music video


director—chris hopkins
production—lost art
executive producer—sasha nixon/forever
line producer—axel moline
dop—tim tregoning
1ac—brad andrew
1ad—jack doherty
key grip—glenn arrowsmith
gaffer—anthony veith
production assistant—ella fajdiga
previsualisation illustrations—emi ueoka
vfx/compositing—cadre pictures
vfx producer—steven kerswell
color—edel rafferty
stylists—lars stoten & sophie marcoux
hair & make-up—hanae mikami
post-production camera—matt toll
band photographs—shervin lainez
edit, graphics & additional compositing—chris hopkins
footage by adrian maben—courtesy of arthaus musik
